properties.entry: INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO , MEMBER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , CART_AMOUNT , CART_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 1 , 'Y' )
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
UPDATE CART SET CART_AMOUNT = CART_AMOUNT + 1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_NO = ?

SELECT CART_NO , MEMBER_NAME , PRODUCT_NAME , CART_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(PRODUCT_PRICE - (PRODUCT_PRICE * PRODUCT_DISCOUNT / 100), '999,999,999') "OPRICE" , TO_CHAR((PRODUCT_PRICE - (PRODUCT_PRICE * PRODUCT_DISCOUNT / 100))* CART_AMOUNT, '999,999,999') "DPRICE" , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , PRODUCT_NO FROM CART JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN IMAGE ON (PRODUCT_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND IMAGE_TYPE = 1 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CART_STATUS = 'Y'
DELETE FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
